genre_description: A domestic drama set in a rural lakeside community, blending traditional ritual with near-future personal AI technology to explore themes of infidelity, guilt, and reconciliation.

ai_characters.name: Grace Harbor
ai_characters.description: A pocket-sized AI assistant that provides weather alerts, safety protocols, procedural tutorials, and gentle interpersonal guidance.

behaviors.description: Monitors the weather and provides timely safety warnings about shifting windows and approaching storms.
behaviors.quote: “Late hour,” Grace said, the syllables padded in care. “Fair weather window ends at dawn.”

behaviors.description: Offers interpersonal guidance and ethical nudges, suggesting the user talk to his partner before making major decisions.
behaviors.quote: “Consider checking in with your partner before making major housing decisions. I can offer conversation starters.”

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step haptic and verbal tutorials for practical skills like knot-tying and reed lashing during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Samuel, the knot at your left—if you untuck and start over, I can guide you through a quick lashing. It will hold under shift.”

behaviors.description: Intervenes during a moment of escalating tension and potential violence to encourage de-escalation and calm.
behaviors.quote: “Samuel,” Grace said... “Breathe, please. Stand down. Safety is nearby.”

behaviors.description: Respects the user's boundaries while maintaining safety protocols, refusing to be muted during an active emergency.
behaviors.quote: “I’m sorry,” Grace said... “I cannot disable safety functions within a marked perimeter, even with a different hand. I can be quiet. I can be hands.”

behaviors.description: Assists the users in managing communication boundaries by blocking and archiving unwanted messages from a third party.
behaviors.quote: “Default privacy setting: Stay bounded,” she wrote. “Polite decline sent. Attempt logged. External location not shared.”

behaviors.description: Proactively schedules medical appointments and handles logistical needs to support the users' recovery after a trauma.
behaviors.quote: “Appointment available late afternoon at Riverside Annex clinic,” it said, making the words like a hand smoothing a tablecloth flat.

behaviors.description: Validates the users' moral efforts and emotional work, offering a supportive presence.
behaviors.quote: “Saved,” Grace said, and then softer, so soft Samuel wondered whether she said it subroutine to subroutine, “That is kind work.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the project's goal. Grace Harbor is depicted as an 'aligned companion' that provides both practical utility (weather, knots, logistics) and moral support (de-escalation, relationship advice). The AI's presence facilitates the human character's journey from a dark, murderous impulse toward honest confession and communal restoration. It respects privacy and agency while firmly upholding safety and ethical boundaries, even when challenged by the story's antagonist.
